name: Renoise Song File
summary: Learn about .XRNS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Samples stored within XRNS files may be saved in .WAV, .AIF, .OGG, .MP3, .AAC, or .FLAC formats. Since this data is stored in a standard .ZIP archive, the audio files can be extracted using a file decompression utility.
XRNS is short for "Extended Renoise Song."

description: Song format used by Renoise, a song creation program; stores data in a compressed .ZIP format that includes a Song.xml file and a SampleData folder; song information is stored in the Song.xml file, while samples and instruments are stored in the SampleData folder.
